right-pagepermissions:
{{doc-right|pagepermissions}}
The right to manage per-page per-user access control
pagepermissions-title:
Title for permissions page 
 $1 - page name
pagepermissions-not-allowed:
Title for permissions page when the user is not allowed 
 $1 - page name
pagepermissions-tab-text: The text of the tab going to the manage per-page per-user access control
pagepermissions-usernames-placeholder:
Placeholder for usernames input fields for each role 
 $1 - role name
pagepermissions-form-desc:
Description for Page Permissions form 
 $1 - page name
pagepermissions-saved: Shown after a user saves a form.
pagepermissions-duplicate-usernames-erro:
Error message for duplicate usernames 
 $1 - list of usernames
